info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 05 at 6:20PM MDT until August 05 at 11:00PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN EDMUNDS AND NORTHEASTERN FAULK COUNTIES... At 719 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Cresbard, or 16 miles northeast of Faulkton, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... South Scatterwood Lake around 725 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include North Scatterwood Lake, Mina and Mina Lake Rec Area. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for large hail and damaging winds. People outside should move to a shelter, inside a strong building and away from windows.
